TopicTitle: How do you add a SPOILER

Articles.Content:
[ spoiler=SpoilerTitle ]What You Want In The Spoiler[ /spoiler ]

Without any spaces inside the brackets, so [ /spoiler ] would actually be

. Replace SpoilerTitle and What You Want in the spoiler with whatever you want.
^what he said. Don't forget the equal sign is only in the first bracket or it won't work

You can even nest them like so

Javascript is disabled. View full album

quote this post for how it's done.
